response.overview: The present moment has made it very clear just how precarious  our food system is. The Trade war with the US and China is just another layer of uncertainty laid on top of the environnemental factors that are chipping away at the durability of our present food supply chains. The film SEA to LAND is looking at the whole question of  re-localizing more of our food supply but now with the trade wars we can see there are multiple reasons we need to be looking at a local, robust and sustainable food supply system in Canada.
response.title: Sea to Land
